justification: "In the item recognition paradigm, participants study a list of items and at test are required to discriminate between items that they have just studied… and items that they did not study."
construct: memory for learned information / item memory / item recognition memory

justification: "In the source memory paradigm, participants study a list of items … and are required to identify the source in which each item was initially presented."
construct: memory for learning context / source memory / context memory
